articles.title: Apple's new Proton-like tool can run Windows games on a Mac - The Verge
articles.description: Apple has announced a significant tool for getting Windows games running on Mac. A new Game Porting Toolkit can run DirectX 12 games on macOS unmodified, allowing developers to quickly port games.
